notes: These data exclude nonprofit universities and colleges and federally funded research and development centers (FFRDCs) administered by nonprofit organizations. Detail may not add to total because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Nonprofit Research Activities FY 2021 module of the 2022 Annual Business Survey.
